attributes.action: To recognise both battles of Waterloo and Trafalgar.
attributes.additional_details: Two battles that helped to made Britain GREAT. To again make Great Britain GREAT, something that has been lost and forgotten over time. The Royal Navy have Trafalgar Day (21 October) and certain Regiments within the British Army mark Waterloo Day (18 June). Why not let the mass population ‘the big society’ celebrate these historic dates and make Britain GREAT again.
